sentence: Harper, 38, shot back: “What we don’t need to happen is have Josh Mandel talk for the Black community.” At one point, Mandel called Harper a “looney Nancy Pelosi” for “advocating for all this green energy” when Harper pledged to support renewable energy to help mitigate climate change.
author: Liz Skalka
title: A Hard-Right Republican And A Progressive Debated. It Went As Well As You'd Expect.

sentence: Jon Skolnik @ Salon: GOP Senate candidate Josh Mandel makes bizarre claim about slavery during debate.
author: Kyle Mantyla
title: Right Wing Round-Up: Entitled White Lady

sentence: Don’t you suck up to him.” The second Josh Mandel v. Morgan Harper debate is going completely off the rails pic.twitter.com/DtZJZxmK40 — Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022 Promoted Content Mandel is just openly insulting Harper at this debate, to groans pic.twitter.com/YANuVOJn9X — Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022 After a debate in which Mandel called Harper dumb and scolded her for being “angry” about a dozen times, Harper refuses to shake his hand pic.twitter.com/yTuvfYDGzm — Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022 The full debate is in the video below: Harper posted a video message on Tuesday, blasting Mandel, calling him a sexist and a racist.

sentence: ‘You’re actually dumber than AOC.’ ‘Why are you so angry?’ Donate to my campaign to keep Josh Mandel’s hateful, sexist and racist rhetoric out of the Senate.https://t.co/RxdXFeviiB pic.twitter.com/egt7ImPlpy — Morgan Harper (@mh4oh) February 22, 2022 “Last night I debated Josh Mandel in Cleveland,” she said, “and we saw from him what we’ve come to expect, racism, sexism, xenophobia, this guy has no solutions for the real issues that everyday Ohioans are facing and certainly no solutions for the black community,” throwing down the race card.

title: ‘Like AOC only dumber’: Ohio senate debate goes off the rails as racial hate turns to white Marine vet
